sqlMap.select: select ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

select ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY (ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO) values (#id:VARCHAR#, #orderId:VARCHAR#, #createTime:NUMBER#, #payConfirmDate:NUMBER#, #orderAmount:NUMBER#, #payPoundScale:NUMBER#, #serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, #payChannel:VARCHAR#, #externalNo:VARCHAR#, #paySettleStatus:VARCHAR#, #payCheckStatus:VARCHAR#, #tradeStatus:VARCHAR#, #paymentType:VARCHAR#, #payId:VARCHAR#, #bankName:VARCHAR#, #bankCode:VARCHAR#, #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, #tradeType:VARCHAR#, #bookAccountStatus:VARCHAR#, #payOrderId:VARCHAR#, #cardType:VARCHAR#, #accountNo:VARCHAR#, #collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, #version:NUMBER#, #bankCardNo:VARCHAR#, #payTradeId:VARCHAR#, #recordCreateTime:NUMBER#, #recordCreateSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, #batchInternalNo:NUMBER#, #isClearing:VARCHAR#, #tradeSubject:VARCHAR#, #payNo:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY set ID = #id:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:NUMBER#, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE = #payConfirmDate:NUMBER#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:NUMBER#, PAY_POUND_SCALE = #payPoundScale:NUMBER#, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHANNEL = #payChannel:VARCHAR#, EXTERNAL_NO = #externalNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS = #paySettleStatus:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHECK_STATUS = #payCheckStatus:VARCHAR#, TRADE_STATUS = #tradeStatus:VARCHAR#, PAYMENT_TYPE = #paymentType:VARCHAR#, PAY_ID = #payId:VARCHAR#, BANK_NAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#, BANK_CODE = #bankCode:VARCHAR#, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:VARCHAR#, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS = #bookAccountStatus:VARCHAR#, PAY_ORDER_ID = #payOrderId:VARCHAR#, CARD_TYPE = #cardType:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #version:NUMBER#, BANK_CARD_NO = #bankCardNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_TRADE_ID = #payTradeId:VARCHAR#, RECORD_CREATE_TIME = #recordCreateTime:NUMBER#, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #recordCreateSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO = #batchInternalNo:NUMBER#, IS_CLEARING = #isClearing:VARCHAR#, TRADE_SUBJECT = #tradeSubject:VARCHAR#, PAY_NO = #payNo:VARCHAR# where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
ID = #id:VARCHAR#
ORDER_ID = #orderId:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:NUMBER#
PAY_CONFIRM_DATE = #payConfirmDate:NUMBER#
ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:NUMBER#
PAY_POUND_SCALE = #payPoundScale:NUMBER#
SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#
PAY_CHANNEL = #payChannel:VARCHAR#
EXTERNAL_NO = #externalNo:VARCHAR#
PAY_SETTLE_STATUS = #paySettleStatus:VARCHAR#
PAY_CHECK_STATUS = #payCheckStatus:VARCHAR#
TRADE_STATUS = #tradeStatus:VARCHAR#
PAYMENT_TYPE = #paymentType:VARCHAR#
PAY_ID = #payId:VARCHAR#
BANK_NAME = #bankName:VARCHAR#
BANK_CODE = #bankCode:VARCHAR#
TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#
TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:VARCHAR#
BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS = #bookAccountStatus:VARCHAR#
PAY_ORDER_ID = #payOrderId:VARCHAR#
CARD_TYPE = #cardType:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo:VARCHAR#
COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#
VERSION = #version:NUMBER#
BANK_CARD_NO = #bankCardNo:VARCHAR#
PAY_TRADE_ID = #payTradeId:VARCHAR#
RECORD_CREATE_TIME = #recordCreateTime:NUMBER#
RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #recordCreateSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#
BATCH_INTERNAL_NO = #batchInternalNo:NUMBER#
IS_CLEARING = #isClearing:VARCHAR#
TRADE_SUBJECT = #tradeSubject:VARCHAR#
PAY_NO = #payNo:VARCHAR#
where ID = #id:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#
CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:NUMBER#
PAY_CONFIRM_DATE = #record.payConfirmDate:NUMBER#

PAY_CHANNEL = #record.payChannel:VARCHAR#
EXTERNAL_NO = #record.externalNo:VARCHAR#
PAY_SETTLE_STATUS = #record.paySettleStatus:VARCHAR#
PAY_CHECK_STATUS = #record.payCheckStatus:VARCHAR#
TRADE_STATUS = #record.tradeStatus:VARCHAR#
PAYMENT_TYPE = #record.paymentType:VARCHAR#
PAY_ID = #record.payId:VARCHAR#

BANK_CODE = #record.bankCode:VARCHAR#
TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #record.tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#

update TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY set ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#, ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:NUMBER#, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE = #record.payConfirmDate:NUMBER#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:NUMBER#, PAY_POUND_SCALE = #record.payPoundScale:NUMBER#, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE = #record.serviceProviderCode:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHANNEL = #record.payChannel:VARCHAR#, EXTERNAL_NO = #record.externalNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS = #record.paySettleStatus:VARCHAR#, PAY_CHECK_STATUS = #record.payCheckStatus:VARCHAR#, TRADE_STATUS = #record.tradeStatus:VARCHAR#, PAYMENT_TYPE = #record.paymentType:VARCHAR#, PAY_ID = #record.payId:VARCHAR#, BANK_NAME = #record.bankName:VARCHAR#, BANK_CODE = #record.bankCode:VARCHAR#, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO = #record.tradeExternalNo:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TYPE = #record.tradeType:VARCHAR#, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS = #record.bookAccountStatus:VARCHAR#, PAY_ORDER_ID = #record.payOrderId:VARCHAR#, CARD_TYPE = #record.cardType:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT_NO = #record.accountNo:VARCHAR#, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO = #record.collectMoneyAccountNo:VARCHAR#, VERSION = #record.version:NUMBER#, BANK_CARD_NO = #record.bankCardNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_TRADE_ID = #record.payTradeId:VARCHAR#, RECORD_CREATE_TIME = #record.recordCreateTime:NUMBER#, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME = #record.recordCreateSubareaTime:TIMESTAMP#, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO = #record.batchInternalNo:NUMBER#, IS_CLEARING = #record.isClearing:VARCHAR#, TRADE_SUBJECT = #record.tradeSubject:VARCHAR#, PAY_NO = #record.payNo:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO from ( select ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO from ( select OUT.* , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select ID, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, PAY_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAY_POUND_SCALE, SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE, PAY_CHANNEL, EXTERNAL_NO, PAY_SETTLE_STATUS, PAY_CHECK_STATUS, TRADE_STATUS, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAY_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_CODE, TRADE_EXTERNAL_NO, TRADE_TYPE, BOOK_ACCOUNT_STATUS, PAY_ORDER_ID, CARD_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, COLLECT_MONEY_ACCOUNT_NO, VERSION, BANK_CARD_NO, PAY_TRADE_ID, RECORD_CREATE_TIME, RECORD_CREATE_SUBAREA_TIME, BATCH_INTERNAL_NO, IS_CLEARING, TRADE_SUBJECT, PAY_NO from TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
) OUT )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
)
where oracle_rn < $endNum$
and oracle_rn > $skipNum$

select ID from ( select ID as ID , ROWNUM as oracle_rn2 from ( select
$selectedField$ as ID
TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY.ID as ID
, ROWNUM as oracle_rn from TB_UPP_PAY_TRADE_HISTORY
order by $orderByClause$
) )
where oracle_rn2 < $endNum$
and oracle_rn2 > $skipNum$
